Lyric:
[by:LEFTWords]
[00:05.90]Let the games begin 
[00:12.70]Let the games begin
[00:14.94]Passed out, all my friends went and passed out
[00:20.09]So much for the night
[00:22.23]Last round for a.m. lovers that's how I come alive
[00:28.21]I'm gonna be a people person in a room of people people
[00:32.09]Imma keep on running this shit 
[00:33.98]Let the games begin
[00:36.16]A people person in a room of people people
[00:38.93]Imma be the kid for the win
[00:41.18]Let the games begin
[00:44.89]Let the games begin [x6]

[01:11.84]Cab ride just up here on the right side
[01:17.17]Two more for the road
[01:18.68]Sometimes when that game hits the wrong vibe you take it home
[01:24.99]I'm gonna be a people-person in a room of people-people
[01:28.47]Imma keep on running this shit
[01:30.90]Let the games begin

[01:35.73]Imma be the kid for the win
